definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in
to make sb change their ways, opinions etc
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: Sex ratio of total population tended to balance; while birth sex ratio is somewhat higher.
sentences.chinese: 总人口性别结构趋于平衡，但出生人口性别比偏高。

sentences.english: In recent years, the gender disproportion problem of newly-born population is growing more and more serious.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，我国出生人口性别比失衡现象日趋严重。

sentences.english: Some of the consequences of the skewed sex ratio have been unexpected.
sentences.chinese: 性别比率失衡还带来一些始料不及的影响。

definition: urbanization level (of a city or town)
rate of infection (usu. of a disease)
Gini coefficient (a measure of statistical dispersion)
percentage of children who enter school
